task.title: Setting up a Tax Class for Items with a Default Tax Rate
task.abstract: Tax classes will default to the same tax rate if the Use Default Tax Rate checkbox is enabled on the Tax Class record.

ul.li: Disable the Is Default Tax Rate checkbox on the original Default Tax Rate item.

prereq.note: Only one Default Tax Rate can be designated for a tax class.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Item Classes tab in the eStore application and click the New button.
Enter the Name of the Item Class and check the Is Active checkbox.
Check the Use Default Tax Rate checkbox to indicate that the default tax rate will be used for all related items created under the tax class.
Click the New Item button on the Items related list and set up a new default tax rate with the Is Default Tax Rate checkbox selected. Link the the tax rate to a Default Tax Locale.
